mapper.insert:
insert into Member ( MNUM, MID, MPASS, MNAME, MNICK, MEMAIL, MAUTHLEVEL, MGENDER, MBIRTH, MTEL, MZIPCODE, MADDR1, MADDR2, MLEVEL, MEXP, MRECENTLOGINDATE, MIP, MOUT, MISOUT, MJOINDATE ) values ( mem_seq.nextval, #{mId}, #{mPass}, #{mName}, #{mNick}, #{mEmail}, #{mAuthLevel, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{mGender}, #{mBirth, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mTel}, #{mZipcode}, #{mAddr1}, #{mAddr2}, #{mLevel, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{mExp, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{mRecentLoginDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mIp}, #{mOut, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mIsOut, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{mJoinDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
)
